revised_title: Hassitt-Type Young Operator Expansions and Orthogonal Transformations
tldr: The article presents an expansion of the Young operators of the symmetric group in terms of two-sided products of the Young operators of the same group and the transposition. This expansion allows for a simpler recursive construction of the Young operators and provides a direct verification of their orthogonality. The study is relevant to understanding the properties and representations of the symmetric group.
